snippet: The N.H.L. Board of Governors is expected to approve the deal Commissioner Gary Bettman reached with Donald Fehr and the N.H.L. Players’ Association.
abstract: NHL Board of Governors will convene in New York to vote on new collective bargaining agreement with players’ association, but will also consider whether Gary Bettman should keep his job as commissioner.
lead_paragraph: The N.H.L. Board of Governors is expected to approve the deal Commissioner Gary Bettman reached with Donald Fehr and the N.H.L. Players’ Association.

headline.seo: Official Vote on N.H.L. Agreement; Unofficial One on Bettman
headline.main: An Official Vote, and an Unofficial One
headline.print_headline: An Official Vote, and an Unofficial One
